column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This was such a tasty meal! The prices are normal for a ramen restaurant
column2: but the ramen was DELICIOUS! I had the Tonkotsu Assari
column7: and seasoned egg. The broth was the right amount of flavor. I never liked kikurage before
column8: but here I enjoyed it! The seasoned egg was my favorite part. It tasted like they carefully seasoned each egg. I ordered the thick noodles
column9: and it tasted like quality noodles.
